name: Beer Pong : Trickshot
summary: Crazy about Beer Pong? Then switch to 3D Beer Pong Free Games “Beer Pong Tricks Shot”. Now grab the ping pong ball game and toss the ball as like paper toss in the trash bin to experience real Beer Pong Games fun. Use multiple beer pong tricks to flick and toss the ping pong ball in this ultimate ping ball games. Hop the ball, hit the beer & toss the ball in beer mug and avoid beer can knockdown.
